name: Erämaa
description:
Erämaa (Wasteland/Wilderness) is basically an artsy tve kvlt walking simulator focused on parallax visuals and drone ambience. This was a short weekend solo project without any meaningful purpose, "a jamless jam". As a test this is also my first project finished with Godot 4 (beta2). Please also note that due to many big background layers the game might be poorly optimised, even though it's a simple game.

(I had issues with Firefox browser for some reason... Might work better on other browsers. Also Windows build has apparently some issues too... These export problems might be out of my scope to repair. Let's keep waiting for Godot 4 stable, I guess.)
